Title: silverstripe/framework Privilege Escalation Risk in Member Edit form
Description:
A member with the permission `EDIT_PERMISSIONS` and access to the "Security" section is able to re-assign themselves (or another member) to `ADMIN` level.

CMS Fields for the member are constructed using DirectGroups instead of Groups relation which results in bypassing security logic preventing privilege escalation.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.5.7-rc1 before 3.5.8, all versions starting from 3.6.0-rc1 before 3.6.6, all versions starting from 4.0.0-rc1 before 4.0.4, all versions starting from 4.1.0-rc1 before 4.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.5.7-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.8 before 3.6.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.6.6 before 4.0.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.0.4 before 4.1.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.1.1
